body.name: Head & Shoulders Clinical Dandruff Defense + Dry Scalp Rescue Shampoo 13.5 oz Twin Pack
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 23 hrs 2 mins
features: DRY SCALP RESCUE: Head & Shoulders Clinical Strength Dandruff Defense + Dry Scalp Rescue Shampoo AND Head & Shoulders Clinical Dandruff Defense + Dry Scalp Rescue Conditioner
PRESCRIPTION STRENGH* SHAMPOO: Made with 1% Selenium Sulfide for prescription strength* dandruff relief and flaking protection *flake protection vs prescription dandruff shampoo 2% ketoconazole
CLINICALLY PROVEN: Up to 100% dandruff protection* *visible flakes; with regular use
MULTI-SYMPTOM RELIEF: Offers proven protection from flakes* and dryness. *Flakes associated with dandruff
body.description: Introducing NEW Head & Shoulders Clinical Strength Dandruff Defense + Dry Scalp Rescue Shampoo AND NEW Head & Shoulders Clinical Dandruff Defense + Dry Scalp Rescue Conditioner, brought to you by America’s #1 dermatologist-recommended brand. Our shampoo formula provides prescription strength flake protection (vs prescription dandruff shampoo 2% ketoconazole) and provides soothing relief from dryness. Clinically proven to protect against flakes and dandruff, our shampoo and conditioner are a great remedy for a dry scalp. Infused with manuka honey and provides relief for dryness. Nourish your scalp and hair for a healthy, vibrant look you’ll love.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great price and quality
reviews.reviewText: I loved this for my brother. He’s seen results from this product. He has a dry scalp and this has helped a lot. It smells great too

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars No more egzama!
reviews.reviewText: Helped my egzama a lot!! Literally saved me!! but smell weird so get an after shower hair spray so your hair can smell nicer

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I’ve used different prescriptions as well as every dandruff over the counter product. I finally tried this one and couldn’t be happier. The scent is pretty strong and unpleasant but if you let it sit in your scalp for a while then rinse with cold water it will feel amazing on your scalp. First time in months I haven’t had horrible flaking

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2023
reviews.reviewText: feel like I've tried a ton of these and most of them only slightly help but this one has shown results in the week I've used it. have almost no dandruff for once in years.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Does help with dandruff but smells chemically
reviews.reviewText: It does do the job and does it well. My dandruff is gone and the itchiness associated with it. Only downside as others have noted is that there's a off putting chemically scent. I combat that with using a better smelling conditioner or using a good smelling oil in my hair.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I actually love it - Nizoral’s got nothing on this stuff!
reviews.reviewText: I LOVE this shampoo and conditioner. I have very thick, curly, 4A-4B hair and it’s long and needs products that have high slip and can moisturize without sitting on my scalp bc I have horrible seborrhoeic dermatitis and when I scratch my scalp, it literally just cakes up under my nails. I have to wash my hair once a week or my scalp will go insane. Not with this stuff!! It’s moisturizing and had fantastic lather, I LOVE the smell. It reminds me of cologne with an ever so slightly medicated scent ( it’s a medicated shampoo, cmon now y’all ) and the conditioner is fantastic. It is the only thing that has gotten the flaking and the scalp scaleyness to go away! I barely even scratch now, no dandruff, no irritation or itching! I wash my hair once a week and i’m all set!! I tried Nizoral and it has NOTHING on this for the same price AND i get a medicated conditioner??? I highly recommend this product! I use it with a shampoo brush for a good deep srub and I always feel fansasgic afterwords, my curls aren’t dry or all separated. 10/10!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It took about 2 months of using this, but after 2 years of dandruff I couldn’t get rid of I’m finally dandruff free!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Shampoo okay, conditioner came broken/damaged
reviews.reviewText: Have not used yet but conditioner came damaged.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on December 18, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Very effective for clearing dandruff/moderate scalp irritation. Also effective on beard area.

Funciona al 100% desde el primer día de uso, mi mujer y yo cansados de tirar el dinero comprando champoos para la caspa en farmacias y cadenas de mercado, y cada día con más y más caspa incluso en la barba, hasta que hemos encontrado este producto de H&S se nos ha quitado toda la caspa.

Me impresiono la rapidez con que pude controlar mi problema, que era muy severo, en una semana vi los resultados, lo utilize dos veces por dia la primer semana, despues solo una vez al dia por otra semana y por ultimo solo cada 3 dias.Lo bueno es que solo se necesita muy poco shampoo en cada aplicacion, ya que hace mucha espuma y en realidad solo hay que aplicarlo a la cabeza y no a todo el pelo.Si es cierto que tiene un olor peculiar, muy ligero, como a medicina, pero solo lo note los primeros 2 dias que lo use, sera que me acostumbre o que ahora que lo utilizo con menos frecuencia ya no es perceptible.Definitivamente lo recomiendo, y espero que sigan fabricando este shampoo.
I bought this shampoo but I’m not sure this original or not
